issue.title: [C++] Use [[nodiscard]]
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have a `ARROW_MUST_USE_TYPE` macro that's only enabled on clang-based builds.
Instead we can use the `[[nodiscard]]` that's standard in C++17.
